content:
$金达威(SZ002626)$  止盈目标位附近，自己决定去留

![E241CD5FE42E87C1CE6FC717CB7F7426_w720h765.jpg](https://github.com/darrelltc/tinymind-blog/blob/main/assets/images/2024-11-14/1731553621088.jpg?raw=true)

$氯碱化工(SH600618)$  止盈目标位附近自己决定去留

![26BEF21C2BC8267589DC79F2B65F9E58_w720h765.jpg](https://github.com/darrelltc/tinymind-blog/blob/main/assets/images/2024-11-14/1731553007270.jpg?raw=true)

$道恩股份(SZ002838)$  这个到目标位了，后续的操作就看你们自己了，一路板一路拿着，等什么收绿色了卖给追涨的就可以了。![C414BED3A7B73C79970EAFF4C2D958C6_w720h765.jpg](https://github.com/darrelltc/tinymind-blog/blob/main/assets/images/2024-11-14/1731552606295.jpg?raw=true)
“治学三境界”是王国维《人间词话》提出的治学方法，具体内容为：古今之成大事业、大学问者，必经过三种之境界： “昨夜西风凋碧树，独上高楼，望尽天涯路” 此第一境也； “ 衣带渐宽终不悔，为伊消得人憔悴” 此第二境也； “ 众里寻他千百度，蓦然回首，那人却在，灯火阑珊处”此第三境也。

1. Don't associate with people who are buddies with everybody.

2. It is better to be alone than with someone feeding you baloney.

3. Money allows you the freedom to leave behind those situations and people you do not like.

4. If it wasn't lonely at the top, I would not be lonely now.

5. Loyalty is a precious commodity. If you acquire it, hold on to it.

6. Rule number 1: Believe in yourself.

7. As a rule of thumb, mistrustfulness gives way to envy.

8. Not everyone is your friend. Never think so.

9. Don't forget how hard you wanted what you have now. Better things come your way.

10. Never regret having a good heart; good things always come around and multiply in return.
